creditline: Gift of Elizabeth and Willard Clark
description: 6-armed, 6-legged, six-headed figure with dark skin standing on stampeding bull; drawing bow and arrow with two hands, while the other hands hold various other weapons; both figure and bull wear decorations.
inscription: Box inscription: {Daiitoku myōō Ono Noritoshi sōjō hitsu} (Daiitoku myōō painted by the monk Ono Noritoshi)
title: Daiitoku Myōō, the Wisdom King of Awe-Inspiring Power
